name: The Federation
description: This Sazerac variation swaps in añejo tequila instead of rye and uses creme de cacao for sweetener.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce Creme de Cacao, such as Tempus Fugit

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse a rocks glass with absinthe, pour out remainder, then fill with ice. Add tequila, creme de cacao, and Angostura bitters. Stir gently. Garnish with orange twist and serve.
